column1: echo ¦sudo¦useradd seluser --shell /bin/bash --create-home && sudo usermod -a -G sudo seluser && echo 'ALL ALL = (ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL' >> /etc/sudoers && echo 'seluser:secret' | chpasswd :: Filesystem_operation
